home.description: Software developer based in Colombia. Remote work lover with 4+ years of experience working with agile teams all over the world. JavaScript and front-end specialist. Travel enthusiast and food lover.

about.title: More about me
about.description:
Born and raised in Colombia, I've been working remotely as a software engineer since 2016 for local and international companies with agile teams following good practices guidelines.

My focus is in front-end development and JavaScript stack while doing some bits on back-end as well. Besides web development, I'd like to work on videogame development, artificial intelligence and mentoring aspiring developers.

I'm currently available for freelance work. If you have a project or just want to know more about me, {cv} or get in touch.
about.instructions: Hover the icons to see more

jobs.everfi: Implementation of a common framework for reusable and accessible UI components; customization of their look and feel using SASS based themes. Development of online educative courses with custom requirements related to design and functionality.
jobs.cartago: Development of an AngularJS web application to provide an intuitive interface for massive document management within enterprise solutions.
jobs.victory: Conversion of 300+ Flash-based educative games to HTML5 technologies and vanilla JavaScript.
jobs.swapps: Make sure that the user experience is reflected in the design and translate it into HTML code , as well as implementing visual and interactive elements that users engage with through the application. Worked in multiple projects built in a vast stack: Django, Wordpress, Ionic, AngularJS, Vue.

contact.title: Let's talk
contact.subtitle: Fill out this form for collaborations, job opportunities or just to say hi. I promise I don't bite - not so sure about my dog!
contact.description: Also, you can send an {email} or connect with me using the links at the bottom of the page.
contact.thanks: Thank you! We'll be in touch.
